meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #763.

td.p: Gary Tarpinian, a writer & artist from Boston, Massachusetts
Howard Groopman, an appeals aide from Portland, Oregon
Jeri Anderson, a housewife from Las Vegas, Nevada (whose 1-day cash winnings total $3,600)

tr.td: SPANISH CITIES
COMMERCIAL SLOGANS
9-LETTER WORDS
FLAGS
CRUSTACEANS
MOVIE TAP DANCERS

Jeri
